info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 1 at 1:27PM MDT until April 1 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Southern Sierra County in south central New Mexico... Northeastern Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... West central Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico...
* Until 330 PM MDT.
* At 126 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over mainly rural areas of Uvas Valley.
HAZARD...Near zero visibility with strong winds up to 40 mph.
SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes portions of Hwy 26.
Locations impacted include... Uvas Valley.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 3:30 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 3:30 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Luna, NM; Sierra, NM

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 3:30 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 3:30 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Luna, NM; Sierra, NM
